description: Brandwatch Consumer Research provides digital consumer intelligence through social listening, data analysis, and brand monitoring capabilities.

user_flows.description: Complete workflow for creating, configuring, and managing projects to organize data sources and dashboards
prerequisites: User has access to Consumer Research platform
User has appropriate permissions (Admin, Regular, or Admin+)

steps.description: Navigate to Consumer Research main navigation sidebar and click Projects drop-down menu
steps.details: Projects dropdown appears at top of sidebar

steps.description: Click ellipsis (three dots) icon and select 'Create Project'
Fill in required project information
details: Enter project name (required)
Add description (optional)
Select time zone (required)
Configure project settings (anonymization if available)

steps.description: Configure project access and permissions
details: Click 'Add Project' to proceed to sharing step
Expand client list by clicking + button
Select individual users or entire clients via checkboxes
Users selected will see queries, categories, and tags

steps.description: Complete project setup and access
details: Click 'Save Project Members' to finalize
System creates project and navigates to project screen
Project becomes accessible via Projects dropdown

decision_points.note: Anonymization cannot be changed after project creation

options: Mix of individual and client-level sharing

outcomes: New project created and accessible
Project members configured with appropriate access
Data sources and dashboards can be organized within project
Project appears in user's project list
additional_actions: Edit project details via ellipsis > Edit project
Modify project members via ellipsis > Edit project members
Manage all projects via Consumer Research admin

user_flows.description: Automated dashboard creation process that segments data using AI-generated categories and rules
prerequisites: User has existing data source (query) in project
User has dashboard creation permissions (Admin, Regular, Admin+)
Query has at least 24 hours of data available

steps.description: Navigate to Add Dashboard section
details: Go to Consumer Research Dashboards section
Click 'Add Dashboard'
Scroll to bottom of New dashboard window

steps.description: Choose between Brand Monitoring or Campaign Tracking wizard
details: Brand Monitoring: Monitor single brand using brand query
Campaign Tracking: Analyze hashtag impact and campaign performance

steps.description: Answer wizard questions to define segmentation
details: Select existing data source (query) from project
Choose segmentation aspects (products, hashtags, people, etc.)
Enter specific details for each segmentation type
System uses inputs to create Rules and Categories

steps.description: Examine auto-generated segmentation options
details: Review suggested product breakdowns
Add or remove product aliases
Customize category definitions
Modify pre-filled fields based on query template

steps.description: Complete wizard process and create dashboard
details: System creates dashboard with segmented data views
Auto-generates categories and rules with [WIZARD-N] naming
Dashboard tabs created based on selected segmentation
Categories and rules appear in respective sections

options: Brand Monitoring: For single brand analysis with product/hashtag/people segmentation
Campaign Tracking: For hashtag-focused campaign impact analysis

outcomes: Fully functional dashboard created with pre-filtered data views
Auto-generated categories and rules for data segmentation
Dashboard accessible in project dashboard list
Multiple dashboard tabs based on segmentation choices
Foundation for further customization and analysis

rerun_process.description: Dashboard Wizard can be rerun to modify segmentation
rerun_process.warning: Rerunning deletes all existing wizard-generated items and manual edits
steps: Complete wizard process again with new parameters

cleanup_options: Delete wizard dashboard and all generated items via Delete button
Choose to delete only dashboard or all associated items
Items marked with [WIZARD-N] prefix for easy identification

user_flows.description: Real-time event detection and analysis workflow for discovering significant changes in social media conversations
prerequisites: Active queries or channels set up in project
At least 24 hours of query data available

steps.description: Navigate to Events Feed in Consumer Research
details: Click 'Events feed' in left-hand navigation sidebar
Events marked as 'NEW' in navigation
Feed shows events from last 14 days

steps.description: Examine detected events in chronological feed
details: Events displayed as cards with key metrics
Each card shows percentage of query volume
Events include Volume shifts, Sentiment spikes, Trending content
Cards show timestamp and query association

steps.description: Apply filters to focus on relevant events
details: Use event type filters (Sentiment, Volume, Hashtag, Article, Repost, Country, Author)
Select specific queries using 'Select queries' dropdown
Apply filters and click 'Apply' to update feed
Most relevant events surface automatically

steps.description: Deep-dive into individual events for detailed analysis
details: Click on event card to open detailed dashboard
Examine event-specific tabs (e.g., 'Explore volume shift', 'All activity on the day')
Review metrics like mention volume over time, sentiment analysis, topics, top authors
Access all mentions related to the event

steps.description: Save insights and set up monitoring
details: Save dashboard for ongoing monitoring
Create Signal from event for future notifications
Share dashboard components with team
Set up email alerts for similar events

event_types.trigger: Dramatic upward shift in mention volume
analysis_tabs: Explore volume shift: mention volume over time
All activity: sentiment by hour, topics, top authors, all mentions

event_types.trigger: Dramatic shift in positive or negative sentiment
analysis_tabs: Explore sentiment shift: positive/negative mentions over time
All activity: sentiment by hour, topics, all mentions

event_types.trigger: Dramatic volume shift in specific country
analysis_tabs: Explore trending country: volume comparison by country
All activity: sentiment, topics, authors, mentions
Explore trending repost: volume over time, all mentions
Explore trending article: volume, topics, mentions
Explore trending hashtag: volume, topics, mentions

options: Focus on high-impact events (high query volume percentage)
Investigate sentiment-related events for brand reputation
Monitor geographic trends for regional insights
Track viral content for engagement opportunities
Quick review via event card summary
Take immediate action based on findings

outcomes: Real-time awareness of significant conversation changes
Detailed insights into event drivers and context
Saved dashboards for ongoing event monitoring
Alert systems for future similar events
Actionable intelligence for brand management and campaign optimization
automation_features: Automatic event detection based on threshold algorithms
Auto-generated event cards with key metrics
Integration with existing query and channel data
source_documents: Consumer Research/Using the Events Feed/Using the Events Feed.pdf

user_flows.description: Central dashboard workflow for project overview, quick insights, and rapid access to key platform features
prerequisites: User logged into Consumer Research platform
User has access to at least one project
Data collection active in accessible projects

steps.description: Navigate to Consumer Research homepage
details: Homepage automatically loads most recently visited project
For first-time users, loads biggest project (most queries/rules)
Provides comprehensive project overview

steps.description: Follow guided setup for brand monitoring
details: Set up social accounts connection
Collect conversations through query setup
Visualize data through dashboard creation
Segment data using categories and rules
Get notified via alerts configuration
Start exploring Consumer Research features

steps.description: Perform AI-powered quick searches
details: Enter search terms in quick search interface
AI technology identifies exact entities
Excludes irrelevant results automatically
Provides instant insights without complex setup
Bypasses need for complex searches and visualizations

steps.description: Use homepage shortcuts for common tasks
details: Set up data: Optimize searches for relevant conversations
Analyze data: Explore existing data and share insights
Segment data: Get deeper insights through targeting
Manage alerts: Set up notifications for data changes

steps.description: Review unusual activity alerts (Admin+ users only)
details: Examine volume increase alerts
Review sentiment shift notifications
Check trending country/hashtag/story alerts
Investigate mentioned poster spikes
Click cards to explore further in dashboards

data_peaks_types.description: Sudden spike in mention volume for query
Net sentiment suddenly shifted to overwhelmingly negative
Net sentiment suddenly shifted to overwhelmingly positive
Sudden volume spike from specific country
High repost/retweet activity on single post
High sharing activity for same story/article
Sudden spike in specific hashtag usage
Sudden spike in @mentions of specific handle

options: Use Brandwatch Search for quick insights
Build complex queries for comprehensive monitoring
Combine both approaches for different needs

outcomes: Quick project overview and status understanding
Rapid access to insights via AI-powered search
Early warning system for data anomalies
Streamlined access to key platform features
Foundation for deeper analysis workflows

user_flows.flow_name: Brandwatch AI Search and Quick Insights
user_flows.description: AI-powered search workflow for rapid insights without complex query building
prerequisites: Understanding of search terms and entities of interest

steps.description: Navigate to AI search interface
details: Available from homepage quick search section
Designed for users pushed for time
Primary resource for new users

steps.description: Input brand, person, or topic for analysis
details: Type search terms in search interface
AI technology provides real-time suggestions
System identifies exact entities as you type

steps.description: Examine AI-powered entity identification
details: AI automatically excludes irrelevant results
Ensures more accurate search targeting
Prevents noise from similar but unrelated entities

steps.description: Review immediate data analysis
details: Bypass complex search building process
Get immediate access to conversation data
View pre-built visualizations and analysis

steps.description: Move to advanced features if needed
details: Transition to full query building if required
Create custom dashboards from search results
Set up ongoing monitoring based on search insights

options: Use AI search for quick insights
Build complex queries for comprehensive monitoring

outcomes: Rapid access to social media insights
AI-filtered, relevant conversation data
Foundation for more complex analysis setup
Quick validation of search approach before full implementation
advantages: Accessible to users without technical expertise
Gateway to more advanced platform features
source_documents: Consumer Research/Home/What is AI Entity Search.pdf

integration_points: Projects serve as containers for all data sources and dashboards
Dashboard Wizard integrates with existing query data
Events Feed connects to active queries and channels
Homepage provides unified access to all features
Brandwatch Search can transition to formal query setup
key_features: Automated dashboard creation with data segmentation
